name: CONTROL IT
description:
THIS GAME MADE ON GMTK GAME JAM 2020

Control It is a top view strategy game. Our protagonist is a worm but not just a worm he has mind control abilities and thanks this abilities he can manipulate humans. Against he, humans are losing their controls. But also our abilities are getting weaker and in the game time by time you are controlling or you are be controlled.

HOW TO PLAY!!!

 -Aim humans and press left click to obtain them.

-You can control humans by a,s,d but it is collapseing your stamina.

-Stamina bar is on the center.

-And you can pass one human to other BUT if you do that two or more times you lose your control on human.

-AND PLEASE READ TEXTS IN THE GAME

My games theme all about losing control and gaining that. For example humans lose their controls against player(aka. Worm) and of course player lose their abilities time by time. All that circulation builds my game.

Sorry for all bad animations and less content but two days are not enough for me. I really entertain in that time. Yes I know game has a lot of bug.

-You cant exit the game you need to do force quit.

-Cursor is visible

Yeah I did not solve this problem because my time was out.
